analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/37/0x800df4141fa1e839ec5d7fd980eeeb6f03b9508a.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/37/0x800df4141fa1e839ec5d7fd980eeeb6f03b9508a.sol)
	- token.transferOwnership(_to) (/unique_chucks/37/0x800df4141fa1e839ec5d7fd980eeeb6f03b9508a.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleClosed (/unique_chucks/37/0x800df4141fa1e839ec5d7fd980eeeb6f03b9508a.sol)

Crowdsale.externalPurchase (/unique_chucks/37/0x800df4141fa1e839ec5d7fd980eeeb6f03b9508a.sol#353-361) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_to,_tokens) (/unique_chucks/37/0x800df4141fa1e839ec5d7fd980eeeb6f03b9508a.sol)

Crowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/37/0x800df4141fa1e839ec5d7fd980eeeb6f03b9508a.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/37/0x800df4141fa1e839ec5d7fd980eeeb6f03b9508a.sol)
